full_summary:
## Market Evaluation of Poultry Farms Affected by Avian Influenza (AI) and Chronic Waste Disease (CWD) of Cervids

_____________
**Market Evaluation of Poultry Farms Affected by Avian Influenza (AI) and Chronic Waste Disease (CWD) of Cervids**
_____________

**[English]**
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) has a requirement for market evaluation services to assess the economic impact of Avian Influenza (AI) and Chronic Waste Disease (CWD) of Cervids on poultry farms. The selected vendor will provide a comprehensive analysis of market trends, economic changes, and data-driven insights to support decision-making.

**Notice Details:**

* **Call Number:** cb-597-47176448
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Contract Notice Number:** 2025-00031 / 2023-01119
* **Publication Date:** June 27, 2024
* **Closing Date:** July 15, 2024, 2 PM EST
* **Modification Date:** July 15, 2024
* **Estimated Contract Start Date:** July 22, 2024
* **Estimated Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025
* **Procurement Status:** Expired
* **Category:** SRV
* **Trade Agreement:** Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR), Canada

**Attachments:**

The tender notice and attachments can be downloaded from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41271/2025-00031_-_acan_%28en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/412
